yelp_reviews.author: Marianne B.
yelp_reviews.review: Beautiful center for 55 plus. All amenities plus utilities paid. Very impressive as well as very friendly staff

yelp_reviews.author: K F.
yelp_reviews.review: Bed bugs were found crawling from a wall in my 90-year-old parent's apartment. Called management and their response was blame my parents   One week after infestation was found, a terminator is coming. So for one week these people who don't leave their home are living in a bed bug ridden apartment. Neighbors were NOT notified. Bed bugs can multiply from a few to 13,000 in six months. It was a sickening sight and then Affinity's response was appalling!
